name: Suburbia and surveillance
description: Tru-Vue and View-Masters allow users to look through view finders and discover new worlds and perspectives, something also explored through many films and TV shows, where watching often reveals secrets, truth and even illusions.

key_work.title: Tru-Vue and View-Master
key_work.brief_description: From the 1930s, people could go on 3D adventures with characters like the Lone Ranger thanks to the Tru-Vue stereoscopic viewer. In 1951, Tru-Vue merged with View-Master, which used circular colour reels that brought tourist attractions, travel images and Disney characters to life.
